name: Mindful Dead Chapter1
description:
The world should be always clean and beautiful, don't you think?

Mindful Dead is a simple and deep, and turn-based JRPG. This story is about creepy enemies -Filth-, and Purifiers the world cleaner who slay purify filth, resist the mental curse. (Language: English/日本語あり-詳細はこちらから)

This creation includes the following expressions: 

  • Shady drugs
  •  Violence
  •  Offensive words 
  • Things that should not be understood

-Features 

  • A slightly dark and peculiar world. And unique characters. 
  • Especially, the design was inspired by OFF (by Mortis Ghost). 
  • A turn-based JRPG for a single player, with no time limit and no need for reflexes. 
  • It provided tutorials and advice, so people who have never played turn-based JRPG can enjoy this game. 
  • A simple and strategic battle, there is no level grinding and the equipment is important for the battle. 
  • I'm almost alone creating this. (Thank you, my few friends for advice!)

-Story

Long-time ago, people continue to unchanged conflict. Someone is for wealth. Someone is for love. They repeat war on eternal lust, and many hearts are shattered. However, victors showed no interested in them and lived happily. Even the sun couldn't stand to see everything, so it was in deep sorrow. 

The sun ended up to be the limit, it put an immeasurable curse on the surface. The curse changes people who got extreme pain, into monsters with the power of the stagnant heart.  People call it Filth. And the surface became a sea of blood immediately.  

Therefore, humans who have a beautiful and tough mind, rose up to save the world.  People call them Purifiers, and purifiers purged monsters with their relic and cleaned up the surface.

-Playtime

Only story: about 2 hours 

Including exploration: about 4 to 5 hours

-Instructions 

Keyboard

  Move...Arrow keys

  Decide/Check...Z or Space or Enter key

  Cancel/Menu...X key

Mouse

  Move...Left-click the point you want to go

  Decide/Check...Left-click

  Cancel/Menu...Right-click

！It includes more instructions in the game file.
